证据片段: Up to 100 L (1 L = 1 Langmuir unit = 1·10^{-6} mbar·s) H2O exposure, the reactivity of the zirconium alloy at 450°C is comparable to the room temperature reaction.

证据片段: After an oxide thickness of 2 nm, the stoichiometric ZrO2 phase is not yet developed.
